content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
All past versions of Isabelle are available here:

http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~lp15/archive/

However, I can’t guarantee that you can find other necessary software to get them running again.

That version of the PNT seems to be lost to bit-rot, and the best hope is to finally port John Harrison’s HOL Light version.

Larry Paulson

From: Mario Carneiro <di.gama@gmail.com>
Hello all,

The prime number theorem exists at
http://www.andrew.cmu.edu/user/avigad/isabelle/NumberTheory/PrimeNumberTheorem.html
, but it appears to not have been kept up to date (it was written for
isabelle 2004). Is it on the AFP or in the library? Barring that, does
Isabelle distribute old versions?

Mario
